name: sockets.cismet.de
description: A universal socket.io service for cross platform/cross software communication
author: helllth

scripts.postversion: sed '/^.*"version":.*$/d' package.json > .package.json.without.version && echo $npm_package_version > .version && git rev-parse HEAD > .githash
scripts.build:docker: VERSION=`echo $npm_package_version| sed 's/\.[0-9]*-SNAPSHOT.*$/-SNAPSHOT/'`; docker build  -t cismet/$npm_package_name -t cismet/$npm_package_name:$VERSION .
scripts.publish:docker: npm run build:docker; VERSION=`echo $npm_package_version| sed 's/\.[0-9]*-SNAPSHOT.*$/-SNAPSHOT/'`; docker tag cismet/$npm_package_name:$VERSION $npm_package_config_dockerRegistryPath/$npm_package_name:$VERSION && docker push $npm_package_config_dockerRegistryPath/$npm_package_name:$VERSION
